title: Bankruptcy Auction of 2017 Bennington G23 Tritoon Boat with 2017 Trailer
item_description:
Bankruptcy Auction of 2017 Bennington G23 Tritoon Boat with 2017 Trailer

Boat Specifications

  • Make: Bennington
  • Model: G23
  • Hull NO: ETWE3228B717
  • CF Number: 0589RW
    • Expiration Date: 12/31/2025
  • Type: Power
  • Hull Material: Aluminum
  • Meter Reads: 90.9

Engine Specifications

  • Engine Year: 2016
  • Engine Make: Yamaha
  • Engine Model: 2500
  • Fuel Type: Gas
  • Engine Type: Single Outboard
  • Engine Power: 2500cc

2017 VM Trailer Specifications:

  • Year: 2017
  • Make: VM
  • VIN: 1VMBP2925H1009857
  • License: 4RH2592
    • Expiration Date: 5/31/2027

Note: (2) Certificate of Titles, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once 1. the court order is received and 2. the title has been signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow several weeks after the removal, 3-4 weeks. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
